Protocols/BKBlukiiReportInfoViolationDel.name: onReportInfoViolation()
Protocols/BKBlukiiReportInfoViolationDel.abstract: Callback for successful request of click report.

Protocols/BKBlukiiReportInfoViolationDel.name: onReportError(_:)
Protocols/BKBlukiiReportInfoViolationDel.abstract: Callback if request of click report fails.

Protocols/BKDecryptSecureBeaconsDelegate.name: onDecryptSecureBeacons(_:decryptedCount:)
Protocols/BKDecryptSecureBeaconsDelegate.abstract: Will be called if BKClient.decryptSecureBeacons(discoveryDataList:) is successfully requested. Parameter decryptedDiscoveryDataList contains all list items contained as parameter in BKClient.decryptSecureBeacons(discoveryDataList:). If the authenticated blukii Manager user is owner of list items that are marked with BKDiscoveryData.secureBeaconState as BKSecureBeaconState.encrypted, these are decrypted.

Protocols/BKDecryptSecureBeaconsDelegate.name: onDecryptError(_:)
Protocols/BKDecryptSecureBeaconsDelegate.abstract: Will be called if BKClient.decryptSecureBeacons(discoveryDataList:) requested has done with errors.

Protocols/BKClientDiscoveryDelegate.html.name: onDiscoveryInitialized()
Protocols/BKClientDiscoveryDelegate.html.abstract: Will be called when the BKDeviceDiscoveryService is initialized

Protocols/BKClientDiscoveryDelegate.html.name: onDiscoveryResult(_:)
Protocols/BKClientDiscoveryDelegate.html.abstract: Will be called frequently after one scan duration for returning the scan results.

Protocols/BKClientDiscoveryDelegate.html.name: onDiscoveryError(_:)
Protocols/BKClientDiscoveryDelegate.html.abstract: Will be called if discovery or resolver fail because of an error

Protocols/BKClientDiscoveryDelegate.html.name: onDiscoveryInfo(_:)
Protocols/BKClientDiscoveryDelegate.html.abstract: Will be called for discovery state information

Protocols/BKBlukiiCloudDelegate.html.name: BKBlukiiCloudDelegate
Protocols/BKBlukiiCloudDelegate.html.abstract: The delegate for receiving state changes of BKCloud.login(). Implementations of this delegate get notified when the login was successful. If an error occurred you get also notified via this delegate.

Protocols/BKBlukiiReportInfoViolationDel.name: BKBlukiiReportInfoViolationDelegate
Protocols/BKBlukiiReportInfoViolationDel.abstract: Delegate for BKBlukiiInfo.reportInfoViolation(infoData: BKInfoData, language: String, senderName: String, senderEmail: String, messageText: String).

Enums/BKBlukiiCloudError.html#/s:10Bluki.name: unauthorized
Enums/BKBlukiiCloudError.html#/s:10Bluki.abstract: An authentication is needed but user is not logged in with valid credentials and api key.

Enums/BKBlukiiCloudError.html#/s:10Bluki.name: noData
Enums/BKBlukiiCloudError.html#/s:10Bluki.abstract: Request is successful but necessary data is not available.

Enums/BKSecureBeaconState.html#/s:10Bluk.name: encrypted
Enums/BKSecureBeaconState.html#/s:10Bluk.abstract: blukii SmartBeacon is a SecureBeacon. DiscoveryData contains encrypted mac address and iBeacon Major and Minor values.

Enums/BKSecureBeaconState.html#/s:10Bluk.name: decrypted
Enums/BKSecureBeaconState.html#/s:10Bluk.abstract: blukii SmartBeacon is a SecureBeacon. DiscoveryData contains decrypted mac address and iBeacon Major and Minor values.

Enums/BKDiscoveryInfo.html#/s:10BlukiiIn.name: bleScanStarted
Enums/BKDiscoveryInfo.html#/s:10BlukiiIn.abstract: The BLE scanner has been started successfully.

Enums/BKDiscoveryInfo.html#/s:10BlukiiIn.name: bleScanStopped
Enums/BKDiscoveryInfo.html#/s:10BlukiiIn.abstract: The BLE scanner has been stopped successfully.

Enums/BKDiscoveryInfo.html#/s:10BlukiiIn.name: bleScanPaused
Enums/BKDiscoveryInfo.html#/s:10BlukiiIn.abstract: The BLE scanner has been paused because of the DiscoverySettings.

Enums/BKDiscoveryError.html#/s:10BlukiiI.name: initFailed
Enums/BKDiscoveryError.html#/s:10BlukiiI.abstract: Initialization of the discovery service has failed.

Enums/BKDiscoveryError.html#/s:10BlukiiI.name: terminationFailed
Enums/BKDiscoveryError.html#/s:10BlukiiI.abstract: Termination of the discovery service has failed.

Enums/BKDiscoveryError.html#/s:10BlukiiI.name: bluetoothOff
Enums/BKDiscoveryError.html#/s:10BlukiiI.abstract: Bluetooth is off on the mobile device.

Enums/BKDiscoveryError.html#/s:10BlukiiI.name: bluetoothOn
Enums/BKDiscoveryError.html#/s:10BlukiiI.abstract: Bluetooth is on on the mobile device.

Enums/BKDiscoveryError.html#/s:10BlukiiI.name: startBleFailed
Enums/BKDiscoveryError.html#/s:10BlukiiI.abstract: The BLE scanner cannot be started by an unknown error.

Enums/BKDiscoveryError.html#/s:10BlukiiI.name: stopBleFailed
Enums/BKDiscoveryError.html#/s:10BlukiiI.abstract: The BLE scanner cannot be stopped by an unknown error.

Enums/BKDiscoveryError.html#/s:10BlukiiI.name: locationServicesIsNotAlways
Enums/BKDiscoveryError.html#/s:10BlukiiI.abstract: The Location Service has not the permission Always

Enums/BKDiscoveryError.html.name: BKDiscoveryError
Enums/BKDiscoveryError.html.abstract: Error codes for discovery functions of class BKClient

Enums/BKDiscoveryInfo.html.name: BKDiscoveryInfo
Enums/BKDiscoveryInfo.html.abstract: Info codes for discovery functions of class BKClient

Enums/BKSecureBeaconState.html.name: BKSecureBeaconState
Enums/BKSecureBeaconState.html.abstract: Indicates if blukii SmartBeacon is sending SecureBeacon advertising and if BKDiscoveryData object contains encrypted data.

Enums/BKBlukiiCloudError.html.name: BKBlukiiCloudError
Enums/BKBlukiiCloudError.html.abstract: Error codes for requests to blukii Manager.

Enums/BKBlukiiCloudUserRole.html.name: BKBlukiiCloudUserRole
Enums/BKBlukiiCloudUserRole.html.abstract: User role retrieved by BKBlukiiCloud.getUserRole() if user is logged in to blukii Manager.

Enums/BKBlukiiType.html.name: BKBlukiiType
Enums/BKBlukiiType.html.abstract: Enum BlukiiType represents the types a blukii can have

Enums/BKCommonState.html.name: BKCommonState
Enums/BKCommonState.html.abstract: Enum that represents an the state of ON, OFF and UNDEFINED

Enums/BKOutputType.html.name: BKOutputType
Enums/BKOutputType.html.abstract: Definition of available output types that can be chosen for a blukii number on blukii Info Manager (https://manager.blukiiinfo.com)

Classes/BKInfoBundleData.html#/c:@M@Bluk.name: timeStamp

Classes/BKBlukiiInfo.html#/s:10BlukiiInf.name: getInfoBundles(bundleIds:completionHandler:)
Classes/BKBlukiiInfo.html#/s:10BlukiiInf.abstract: Request to blukii Manager Info CMS for retrieving info bundles data of a list ob bundle IDs.

Classes/BKBlukiiInfo.html#/s:10BlukiiInf.name: reportInfoViolation(infoData:language:senderName:senderEmail:messageText:)
Classes/BKBlukiiInfo.html#/s:10BlukiiInf.abstract: Reports a blukii Info to blukii Manager Info CMS support if the blukii Info data violates copyright laws or contains any not allowed content.

Classes/BKBlukiiInfo.html#/s:10BlukiiInf.name: reportClick(blukiiId:timeStamp:completionHandler:)
Classes/BKBlukiiInfo.html#/s:10BlukiiInf.abstract: Reports to blukii Manager Info CMS that a blukii Info has been clicked by user.

Classes/BKBlukiiInfo.html#/s:10BlukiiInf.abstract: Static helper for extracting all blukii IDs out of a list of BKDiscoveryData objects, as it retrieved by BKClient discovery (@see BKClientDiscoveryDelegate.onDiscoveryResult(_:)

Classes/BKBlukiiInfo.html#/s:10BlukiiInf.abstract: Converts a numbered barcode string into the blukii ID format.

Classes/BKiBeaconData.html#/c:@M@BlukiiI.name: uuid
Classes/BKiBeaconData.html#/c:@M@BlukiiI.abstract: The UUID if the beacon is emitting iBeacon

Classes/BKiBeaconData.html#/c:@M@BlukiiI.name: major
Classes/BKiBeaconData.html#/c:@M@BlukiiI.abstract: The Major ID if the beacon is emitting iBeacon

Classes/BKiBeaconData.html#/c:@M@BlukiiI.name: minor
Classes/BKiBeaconData.html#/c:@M@BlukiiI.abstract: The Minor ID if the beacon is emitting iBeacon

Classes/BKiBeaconData.html#/s:10BlukiiIn.name: accuracy
Classes/BKiBeaconData.html#/s:10BlukiiIn.abstract: The accuracy of the proximity value, measured in meters from the beacon.

Classes/BKKeyData/Mode.html#/s:10BlukiiI.name: CONVENIENCE
Classes/BKKeyData/Mode.html#/s:10BlukiiI.abstract: low security level; authentication via BLE device address

Classes/BKKeyData/Mode.html#/s:10BlukiiI.name: PAIRING
Classes/BKKeyData/Mode.html#/s:10BlukiiI.abstract: medium security level; authentication via pairing key

Classes/BKKeyData/Mode.html#/s:10BlukiiI.name: SECURE_PREPARED
Classes/BKKeyData/Mode.html#/s:10BlukiiI.abstract: MODE_SECURE, pairing key is not yet set

Classes/BKKeyData/Mode.html#/s:10BlukiiI.name: SECURE
Classes/BKKeyData/Mode.html#/s:10BlukiiI.abstract: high security level; authentication via AES128 encrypted key and pairing key

Classes/BKKeyData/Mode.html.name: Mode
Classes/BKKeyData/Mode.html.abstract: Operating mode of the Smart Key that determines the security level

Classes/BKKeyData.html#/s:10BlukiiInfo9B.name: timeSync
Classes/BKKeyData.html#/s:10BlukiiInfo9B.abstract: Gets the state if the SmartKey has been time synced since last restart

Classes/BKKeyData.html#/s:10BlukiiInfo9B.name: mode
Classes/BKKeyData.html#/s:10BlukiiInfo9B.abstract: Gets the operating mode of the Smart Key that determines the security level

Classes/BKKeyData.html#/s:10BlukiiInfo9B.name: isButtonPushed
Classes/BKKeyData.html#/s:10BlukiiInfo9B.abstract: The state if the SmartKey has been pushed.

Classes/BKEddystoneData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: uidNamespace
Classes/BKEddystoneData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: The UIDNamespace if the beacon is emitting an Eddystone UID

Classes/BKEddystoneData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: uidInstance
Classes/BKEddystoneData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: The Instance ID if the beacon is emitting an Eddystone UID

Classes/BKEddystoneData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: url
Classes/BKEddystoneData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: The url string if the beacon is emitting an Eddystone URL

Classes/BKEddystoneData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: txPower
Classes/BKEddystoneData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: The txPower value if the beacon is emitting Eddystone TLM.

Classes/BKEddystoneData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: battery
Classes/BKEddystoneData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: The battery charge value if the Beacon is emitting Eddystone TLM

Classes/BKEddystoneData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: temperature
Classes/BKEddystoneData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: The Temperature value if the beacon is emitting Eddystone TLM.

Classes/BKEddystoneData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: packets
Classes/BKEddystoneData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: the number of frame packets since the last beacon reset if the beacon is emitting Eddystone TLM

Classes/BKEddystoneData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: activeTime
Classes/BKEddystoneData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: The Time since the last beacon reset if the beacon is emitting Eddystone TLM

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: RSSI_MAX
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Maximum value for rssi threshold: -20

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: RSSI_MIN
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Minimum value for rssi threshold: -120

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: RSSI_DEFAULT
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Default value for rssi threshold: -85

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: getRssiThreshold()
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Gets the rssi threshold for the discovery.

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: setRssiThreshold(_:)
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Sets the rssi threshold for the discovery.

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: calculatingRssiAverage
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: The state if discovery should calculate the average RSSI of all scanned frames.

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: SCANDURATION_DEFAULT
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Scan duration of one discovery phase: 5000 milliseconds.

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: scanDuration
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Value of the duration of one discovery phase in milliseconds. Default is SCANDURATION_DEFAULT

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: SCANWAITDURATION_DEFAULT
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Scan Wait duration between two discovery phase: 15000 milliseconds

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: scanWaitDuration
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Value of the waiting time between two discovery phase in milliseconds. Default is SCANWAITDURATION_DEFAULT

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: DISABLESCANWAITTIMEATSTARTFORTIME_DEFAULT
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Default Value for disableWaitTimeAtStartForTime

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: disableScanWaitTimeAtStartForTime
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Value of the Time in seconds, wich the scanWaitDuration will be disabled, at the start of a scan. Default is DISABLESCANWAITTIMEATSTARTFORTIME_DEFAULT

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: scanInBackground
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Enables / Disables Background scanning.

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: scanContinuouslyOnBackground
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: State if the scan wait duration between two discovery phases is disabled on background. Default value is false

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: scanContinuouslyOnForeground
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Sate if the scan wait duration between two discovery phases is disabled on foreground. Default value is true

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: scanNonBlukiis
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Value, if discovery should scan for non blukii BLE modules.

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: scanBlukiiData
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: the state if discovery should scan for basic blukii data like firmware, advertising interval, etc.

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: scanBeaconSensorData
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Sets the stat if discovery should scan for sensor data of blukii beacons.

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: scanEddystoneData
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Sets the state if discovery should scan for Eddystone data.

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: scanIBeaconData
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Set the state if discovery should scan for iBeacon data.

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: IBEACONREGIONS_DEFAULT
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Default Value iBeacon UUID Regions

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: ibeaconRegionsDefault()
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Default Value iBeacon UUID Regions

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: securebeaconUUID
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Set the for detection of secureBeacon UUID

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: setScanIBeaconRegions(regionStrings:)
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Set the Regions that will be scanned by the Discovery Service.

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: getScanIBeaconRegions()
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Get the Regions that will be scanned by the Discovery Service.

Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.name: setScanIBeaconRegions(regions:)
Classes/BKDiscoverySettings.html#/s:10Bl.abstract: Set teh Regions that will be scanned by teh Discovery Service

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: deviceFoundDate
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets the Timestamp of the first scanned BLE frame that is inside the relevant RSSI range (see setting BKDiscoverySettings.setRSSIThreshold(_:)).

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: macAddress
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets the MacAdress of the BLE module

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: blukiiId
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: The blukii Id of the BLE module.

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: identifier
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets the identifier of the BLE module

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: deviceName
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets the Device Name of the BLE module.

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: device
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets the Bluetooth Device Object (CBPeripheral) of the BLE module.

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: secureBeaconState
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets the state if blukii is advertising secure beacon values.

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: eventBeaconState
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets the state if blukii is advertising event beacon values.

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: beaconSensorData
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets a data object of blukii sensor data.

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: firmware
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets the firmware number of a blukii

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: product
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets the Product ID of a blukii

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: serviceMode
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Checks if blukii Service Mode is active.

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: eddystoneData
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets data object of Eddystone beacon data.

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: iBeaconData
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets a data object of iBeacon data.

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: keyData
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets a data object of key data.

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: type
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets the module type

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: advInterval
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets the advertising interval of a blukii.

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: battery
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets the battery level value of a blukii

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: txPower
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets the txPower value of a blukii.

Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.name: getRssi()
Classes/BKDiscoveryData.html#/s:10Blukii.abstract: Gets the RSSI value of the scanned BLE module.

Classes/BKClient.html#/s:10BlukiiInfo8BK.name: isDiscovering()
Classes/BKClient.html#/s:10BlukiiInfo8BK.abstract: Gets the state if BLE scanner is actuallly running.

Classes/BKClient.html#/s:10BlukiiInfo8BK.name: isDiscoveryInitialized()
Classes/BKClient.html#/s:10BlukiiInfo8BK.abstract: Gets the state if the discovery service is initialized.

Classes/BKClient.html#/s:10BlukiiInfo8BK.name: getDecryptSecureBeaconCacheTimeout()
Classes/BKClient.html#/s:10BlukiiInfo8BK.abstract: Gets the current cache timeout for secure beacon decryption. If value is 0, cache is off.

Classes/BKClient.html#/s:10BlukiiInfo8BK.name: setDecryptSecureBeaconCacheTimeout(_:)
Classes/BKClient.html#/s:10BlukiiInfo8BK.abstract: Sets the current cache timeout for secure beacon decryption. If value is 0, cache is off.

Classes/BKClient.html#/s:10BlukiiInfo8BK.name: decryptSecureBeacons(discoveryDataList:)
Classes/BKClient.html#/s:10BlukiiInfo8BK.abstract: Tries to decrypt the discoveryDataList list items that are marked with BKDiscoveryData.secureBeaconState as BKSecureBeaconState.encrypted. If successful BKDecryptSecureBeaconsDelegate.onDecryptSecureBeacons(_:decryptedCount:) is called with the result list, otherwise BKDecryptSecureBeaconsDelegate.onDecryptError(_:) is called. Therefore an blukii Manager user authentication via BKBlukiiCloud.login() is needed.

Classes/BKBeaconSensorData.html#/s:10Blu.name: airPressure
Classes/BKBeaconSensorData.html#/s:10Blu.abstract: The value of the air pressure sensor. (Read-Only)

Classes/BKBeaconSensorData.html#/s:10Blu.name: acceleration

Classes/BKBeaconSensorData.html#/s:10Blu.name: triggerSwitched
Classes/BKBeaconSensorData.html#/s:10Blu.abstract: The state if a device hardware trigger (like button or reed contact) is actually switched.

Classes/BKFeatureValidator.html.name: BKFeatureValidator

Classes/BKBlukiiInfo.html.name: BKBlukiiInfo
